mapper.select: SELECT t.TRANSACTION_ID, t.CARD_NO, t.TRANSACTION_AMOUNT, t.TRANSACTION_DATE, t.TRANSACTION_TYPE, t.TRANSACTION_ACCOUNT_BALANCE, t.USER_NO, t.TRANSACTION_BEFORE_BALANCE, t.TRANSACTION_LOCATION, t.TRANSACTION_CATEGORY, t.TRANSACTION_STATUS FROM TB_TRANSACTION t INNER JOIN TB_USERS u ON t.USER_NO = u.USER_NO WHERE u.FAMILY_ID = #{familyId} ORDER BY t.TRANSACTION_DATE DESC
